title: Navigate to Add Employee page
testName: Add New Navigate to Add Employee page
testError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: Expected to find element: `h6[class='oxd-text oxd-text--h6 orangehrm-main-title']`, but never found it.
testCommands: page load --waiting for new page to load--
step **I click on PIM in side panel**
page load --waiting for new page to load--
assert expected **h6[class$= 'oxd-topbar-header-breadcrumb-module']** to have text **PIM**, but the text was **''**
step **I click on Add Employee tab**
page load --waiting for new page to load--
assert expected **h6[class='oxd-text oxd-text--h6 orangehrm-main-title']** to have text **Add Employee**, but the text was **''**
